verbs.description: [V: phillip] lindsay asks terrell davis if he can rock no 30 broncos rookie running back phillip lindsay figures if he going to set off on what he hopes is a career fit for the hall of fame what better way to do it than to do it wearing terrell davis number phillip lindsay cd broncos terrell davis
